direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods perform validation but with different parameter configurations.
Both methods involve processing and validation with similar control flows.
Both methods handle validation results and can be used to merge or process results.
Both methods reset or clear state, preparing for new validation operations.
Both methods involve setting up parameters or resources required for validation.

enhanced_by.reason: Setting parameters is necessary to configure the Validator before validation.
Setting the form name is required to specify which validation rules to apply.
This method is directly invoked during the validation process.
Merging results can help in consolidating validation outcomes.
Clearing state can be part of post-validation cleanup.
